prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a flowing cape and mysterious aura.
Imagine a mystical creature that haunts old ruins and whispers secrets.
Generate a dark fairy Pokemon that plays tricks on unsuspecting travelers.
Show me a spectral Pokemon with glimmering eyes and a playful demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of shadows and illusions.
Make a ghostly figure that can manipulate dreams and fears.
Give me a Pokemon that appears in moonlit nights, ethereal and enchanting.
